Language.name: cs
Language.Text:
Haló Jonesi, jsi to ty?
Rád tì vidím, Picarde!
A co Ripleyová, je v poøádku?
Ano, jen se k ní budem muset dostat, potøebujem spolupracovat.
To je sakra lepší pocit, než být na to sám.

Language.name: en
Language.Text:
Hello Jones, is that you?
Glad to see you, Picard!
And what about Ripley, is she OK?
Yes, we just have to get to her, we need to cooperate.
That is a damn better feeling than doing it alone.
